en.name: Flower-Wreathed Feathers
en.passiveDescription: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by {{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}} every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.

zh.name: 缀花之翎
zh.passiveDescription: 滑翔消耗的体力降低15%。进行瞄准射击时，每0.5秒提升重击造成的伤害{{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}}，该效果最多叠加6层，并将在不处于瞄准状态下10秒后移除。
